copyFilesByDateFromFileName.name: Copy to dated folder by date from the file name
copyFilesByDateFromFileName.description:
The task will detect all the files under the source folder (including subfolders).
It will try to extract the date from the filename.
For each day that was found in the filenames, a new folder will be created under the target folder.
Each file will be copied/moved to the corresponding new folder.

sourceFolder.name: Source Folder
sourceFolder.description: The folder will be explored recursively, all the images will be collected

destinationFolder.name: Destination Folder
destinationFolder.description: New folders will be created under this location.

newFolderSuffix.name: New folder suffix
newFolderSuffix.description: This suffix will be added after the newly created folder names.

newFolderDateFormat.name: New folder date format
newFolderDateFormat.description: The new folders will be created based on this date format

fileOperation.name: Copy or Move
fileOperation.description: The files can be copied or moved. If you copy them, make sure you have enough free space on the target.

copyFilesByDateFromFileMeta.name: Copy to dated folder by date from the image capture date
copyFilesByDateFromFileMeta.description:
The task will detect all the files under the source folder (including subfolders).
It will try to extract the capture date from the picture (EXIF).
For each day that was found in the pictures, a new folder will be created under the target folder.
Each file will be copied/moved to the corresponding new folder.

sourceFolder.name: Source Folder
sourceFolder.description: The folder will be explored recursively, all the images will be collected

destinationFolder.name: Destination Folder
destinationFolder.description: New folders will be created under this location.

newFolderSuffix.name: New folder suffix
newFolderSuffix.description: This suffix will be added after the newly created folder names.

newFolderDateFormat.name: New folder date format
newFolderDateFormat.description: The new folders will be created based on this date format

fileOperation.name: Copy or Move
fileOperation.description: The files can be copied or moved. If you copy them, make sure you have enough free space on the target.

moveRawImagesToSubfolders.name: Move raw images into new subfolders under their original location
moveRawImagesToSubfolders.description:
The task will detect all the raw files under the source folder (including subfolders).
It will create a new subfolder in each parent folder that contains at least one raw file.
It will move the raw files into the corresponding newly created folders.

workingFolder.name: Working Folder
workingFolder.description: The folder will be explored recursively, all the raw images will be collected

rawFolder.name: Raw folder name
rawFolder.description: Name of the newly created folders.

importFilesIntoRepo.name: Import file information into Repo
importFilesIntoRepo.description:
The task will detect all known files, and import them into a storage called Repo.
Later you can use this Repo for duplicate detection inside the Repo.
You can also detect duplicates against a folder.

sourceFolder.name: Source Folder
sourceFolder.description: The folder will be explored recursively, all the images will be collected

detectDuplicatesVersusRepo.name: Detect duplicates in a folder agains the Repo
detectDuplicatesVersusRepo.description:
The task will detect all known files, create a signature from the name(lowercased) and the filesize, and look for the same file in Repo.
If the file is already present in the Repo, the file in the sourceFolder will be moved into the destinationFolder.
The remainder content of the sourceFolder is guarranteed not to have duplicates, so you could move anything to your Repo.

sourceFolder.name: Source Folder
sourceFolder.description: The folder will be explored recursively, all the images will be collected

destinationFolder.name: Destination Folder
destinationFolder.description: The duplicates will be moved here.
